uniequip_002_f12yin.name: Forceful Fist

uniequip_002_chyue.name: All Are Guests
uniequip_002_chyue.EN: Chongyue recovers 3 SP if he defeats at least one enemy with a skill
uniequip_002_chyue.CN: 若重岳释放一次技能击倒不少于一个敌人，则回复3点技力

uniequip_002_dagda.name: Gang Spirit
uniequip_002_dagda.EN: Has 30% chance of increasing ATK to 150% when attacking. When deployed, this multiplier increases by +5% for every enemy defeated within the 4 adjacent tiles of a [Glasgow Gang] Operator (max 240%)
uniequip_002_dagda.CN: 攻击时有30%概率使当次攻击力提升至150%，自身在场时，【格拉斯哥帮】干员周围4格内每有一个敌人倒下，攻击力提升额外提升5%（最高提升至240%）
